name: The Adventures of Dumpy
description:
The Adventures of Dumpy takes you on an adventure through different landscapes and environments to save an alien race from being destroyed. It is up to you, Dumpy, to complete tasks and missions to repel the evil forces at large, and maybe you'll meet a pretty girl or boy along the way...Adventure PlatformerThe Adventures of Dumpy takes you through a 2d platformer world full of variety and fun characters to connect with.Points of Interest
  • Different fun worlds to explore, each with their own unique challenges.
  • Full list of achievements to unlock and push your experience to the limit.
  • (Coming Soon) Multiplayer coop functionality to play with your friends and help each other out with dedicated coop challenges.
  • Hours of gameplay available.
  • Full game support available online.
